meaningMnemonic: You're making your <kanji>escape</kanji> from <kanji>prison</kanji> . So this means... <vocabulary>escape from prison</vocabulary>. Or <vocabulary>jailbreak</vocabulary> if you're feeling a little fancy.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
